title: Logitech G915 Lightspeed Keyboard Review - Who Would Buy This?
description: The Logitech G915 Lightspeed aims to be the best gaming keyboard released in 2019.  It uses Logitech's new GL low profile switches and wireless Lightspeed technology.  But is it really that much of an improvement over the Logitech G815 and how does it handle gaming?    Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  G915 Wireless Clicky:  G915 Wireless Tactile:  G915 Wireless Linear:  G915 Wired Clicky:  G915 Wired Tactile:  G915 Wired Linear:   Learn more about the Corsair HydroX here:    Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by Logitech. This video is sponsored by Lian Li and Corsair. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer. As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.   Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera -  Main Lens -  Main Camera Mic -  Second Camera -  $700 Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #logitechg915 #bestgamingkeyboard #hardwarecanucks
